biotools.summary: SynLeGG (Synthetic Lethality with Gene expression and Genomics) provides a suite of analysis and visualisation tools for polyomics data, including CRISPR screens, with integration of Gene Ontology, protein-protein interactions and evolutionary information. It is a free web-based service open to all users, and there is no login requirement.
